data.title: KerioConnect vs Zimbra Collaboration Comparison 2024
data.meta_description: KerioConnect vs Zimbra Collaboration: which is better? Base your decision on 16 verified in-depth peer reviews and ratings, pros & cons, pricing, support and more.
data.text:
Categories and Ranking

Zimbra Collaboration

Ranking in Email Applications

4th

Average Rating

8.0

Number of Reviews

29

Ranking in other categories

No ranking in other categories

Mindshare comparison

As of July 2024, in the Email Applications category, the mindshare of KerioConnect is 6.5%, up from 3.8% compared to the previous year. The mindshare of Zimbra Collaboration is 12.9%, up from 11.6% compared to the previous year. It is calculated based on PeerSpot user engagement data.

Email Applications

Unique Categories:

Featured Reviews

Quotes from Members

We asked business professionals to review the solutions they use. Here are some excerpts of what they said:

Pros

Cons

"It could be simpler to use and install, but I still wouldn't use it because there isn't a compelling use case."

"Most of our clients use Outlook and Kerio Connect. Occasionally, Kerio can be a bit slow. They could make it faster to get onto the web interface without so much load time. It's just slow with Outlook, however, for some reason."

"Having a native Outlook map integration would make Kerio Connect better."

"The search and archiving documentation capabilities need to be stronger."

"I would like to see better support from their support team."

"We are considering switching to Microsoft Exchange. One reason is that it doesn't improve our workflow and doesn't integrate well with Microsoft 365 applications."

"The solution could improve the redundancy because we only have one copy of the Kerio Connect server on our hardware. The next step for us is to move to the cloud and if Kerio does not have a cloud version available they should release one"

"KerioConnect continues to improve with regular updates throughout the year. They must be added to the roadmap, which requires approval."

"It is good and competent, but you have to pay for video and group chat features."

"Zimbra Collaboration could improve the migration from a basic solution to a more containerized solution. For example, the installation should be able to extend to the containers and manage them with some solution, such as OpenShift or Kubernetes."

"The product must be more customizable."

"It would be great if a group chat feature were created to allow for a team environment."

"Zimbra Collaboration's video conferencing could be improved."

"It does have a few bugs."

"The solution could use more integration with third-party tools."

"File sharing permissions with Nextcloud integration need improvement."

Pricing and Cost Advice

Use our free recommendation engine to learn which Email Applications solutions are best for your needs.

792,905 professionals have used our research since 2012.
